entities.name: battle
entities.description: A very rare effect will take place during the battle.

entities.name: wands
entities.description: The wands are mentioned as having a special effect.

entities.name: spells
entities.description: The spells performed by the wands will be regurgitated in reverse order.

entities.name: Cedric
entities.description: Dumbledore mentions that some form of Cedric must have reappeared.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as nodding in response to Dumbledore's statement.

entities.name: Sirius
entities.description: Sirius asks if Diggory came back to life.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore explains the concept of a reverse echo and shadow.

entities.name: Diggory
entities.description: Sirius asks if Diggory came back to life.

relationships.description: A very rare effect will take place during the battle, involving the wands.
The wands will force each other to regurgitate spells in reverse order.
Some form of Cedric must have reappeared, as mentioned by Dumbledore.
Harry nodded in response to Dumbledore's statement.
Sirius asks if Diggory came back to life.
Dumbledore explains that some form of Cedric must have reappeared.
Dumbledore informs Harry about the concept of a reverse echo and shadow.
